properties.schema-text:
{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "billing_record",
  "namespace": "nifi.billing",
  "fields": [
    { "name": "SubName", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "yearmth", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "msisdn", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "on_net_charge",  "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null },
    { "name": "off_net_charge", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null },
    { "name": "intl_charge",    "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null },
    { "name": "local_sms",      "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null },
    { "name": "monthly_fees",   "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Data",           "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null }
  ]
}

labels.label: Upload failed file into error bin in minio
Publish messages to kafka audit table

properties.record:
SELECT
     SubName,yearmth,msisdn,"On-Net Charge" AS "Onnet Voice",
     "Off-Net Charge" AS "Offnet Voice", "Intl Charge" AS "International Voice",
     "Local SMS" AS "SMS Onnet", NULL AS Roaming, "DATA" AS Data,"Monthly Fees",FileName,
     RecordType,DateParsed,Operator
FROM FLOWFILE

properties.schema-text:
{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "UserAccount",
  "namespace": "com.telco.billing",
  "fields": [
    { "name": "msisdn", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "CosID", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Balance", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeSMSBalance", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeSMSExpiry", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeTimeBalance", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeTimeExpiry", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeMoneyBalance", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeMoneyExpiry", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeDataBalance", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "LastCredited", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FreeDataExpiry", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "StandingChargeDue", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "AccountStatus", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ExpiredFlag", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FirstUsed", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "NextLifecycleChangeDate", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "FFAccessDate", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "HomezoneID", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "LastHomezoneDateLanguage", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Language", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "LoyaltyStatus", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "CreditLimit", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Cumulative_usage", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Cumulative_recharge_money", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null }
  ]
}

properties.record:
SELECT 
     msisdn AS DOC_ID, msisdn AS ENTRY_ID, NULL AS OBJECT_ID,NULL AS PARENT_ID,
     NULL AS BAN, CosID AS CARRIER_ID,FirstUsed AS CREATION_DATE, 'active' AS CURRENT_STATE,
     NULL AS CYCLE_DAY,
     ExpiredFlag AS EXPIRY_DATE,
     NULL AS FIRST_NAME,
     NULL AS IMEI,
     NULL AS IMSI,
     NULL AS LAST_NAME,
     'prepaid-lifecycle' AS LIFECYCLE_ID,
     "Language" AS LOCALE,
     msisdn AS MSISDN,
     NULL AS  OWNER,
     NULL AS  PREFERRED_NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL,
     NULL AS  PREVIOUS_CYCLE_DAY,
     'IDLE' AS  PREVIOUS_STATE,
     LoyaltyStatus AS  PRIVILEGE_PROFILE,
     msisdn AS SUBSCRIBER_ID,
     NULL AS TITLE,
     LastCredited AS TRANSITION_DATE,
     'prepaid' AS TYPE,
     NULL AS ONE_TIME_REDIRECTION_FLAG,
     NULL AS TRACE,
     FileName,
     RecordType,
     DateParsed,
     Operator
FROM FLOWFILE
